# scAutoTune

scAutoTune helps find optimal parameters (PCs, HVGs, clustering resolution) for single-cell transcriptomics data.

## Installation
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("shihaisun-scott/scAutoTune")

## Example
library(scAutoTune)
autotune_sc("example.h5ad")
